DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare the efficacy of gastric balloon in weight reduction among two different categories of morbidly obese people.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Gastric Balloon in Morbid Obesity: Prospective Study
DOC.detailed_description: To study to effect of gastric balloon in weight reduction among those above 35 BMI and those above 45 BMI.
DOC.criteria: morbid obesity patient refusal psychological patients oesophageal or gastric abnormalities
